column5: Someone on another site was asking where they could be purchased. I used to go to jigs.com but that is no longer a good site. Does anyone know where they went.  Thanks Stan
"They" didn't go anywhere. James is a member here... I'm sure he'll speak up.
He just replied to the Simcoe thread titled "get your boats out".  He was out fishing today on the Kbay.

I'm still around.  still have a bunch of jigs here.   Havent had the time do much with them the past while.   not enough hours in the day, thats for sure!    you can always send me a pm here if you need or want any, can always mail them out.
